content: you ll love how these crochet slippers make creative use of the classic granny square worked in the round in bernat super value the slippers are created using a variety of techniques like single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet slip_stitch and more available in a huge variety of shades that include solids ombres and heathers bernat super value is your inspiration for creating these textured beauties the pattern is available in children s and ladies sizes materials bernat® super value™ 7 oz/197 g 440 yds/402 m sizes child s 6/8 lady s 7/9 bernat® super value™ 7 oz/197 g 440 yds/402 m sizes child s 6/8 lady s 7/9 version 1 main color mc aqua 53201 contrast a soft fern 53221 contrast b topaz 53514 sizes child s to fit ages 6 to 8 yrs lady s to fit shoe size 7 to 9
